Articles.Content:
I will say hello to the KSP forums with my Munar landing. Unfortunately it was not a very Kerbal success as it can be attributed to ignoring Jeb\'s advice on redundancy, that is having none. Luckily the designer doubled up on lander legs as one fell off during the landing. Landing celebrations ensued however Bill split orange juice all over the command console crashing the on board staging system leaving the three kerbals in the dark about how much fuel was left. In addition to this the orange juice caused a short circuit in the flight controls resulting in an unexpected firing of the engines. Mission control has not heard from this flagship mission since.

(Seriously though, there is an issue with removing focus from the game window and the throttle control on my joystick).

Edited August 30, 2012 by Rich

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
